column4: very basic question, guys. I just installed ubuntu for the first time. I started Firefox, and got to a page which needed Flash player, so it sent me to the flash download page. On the flash download page, I have a choice of which version to install, should I choose "APT for ubuntu 9.04+"?
and also, if I choose that and click "download" I get a message saying "this link needs to be opened with an application. Choose the application to open it with."
just install the package ubuntu-restricted-extras from aplications>Ubuintu software center
